subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Russell Carter scored a career-high 27 points, including a pair of baskets that thwarted a threat by Alabama and sparked a 14-0 run, in host Notre Dame’s 99-85 victory over the fourth-ranked Crimson Tide.
snippet: Russell Carter scored a career-high 27 points, including a pair of baskets that thwarted a threat by Alabama and sparked a 14-0 run, in host Notre Dame’s 99-85 victory over the fourth-ranked Crimson Tide.
